channel.title: Stackable! :()
channel.description: Ok so i just added a armour called Ganodermic and when i spawn it say i spawned two of the bodies they would stack up on top of each other. How do i fix this so they don't stack up. I think it could be client sided not to sure. It has a little 1 next to the item in the invo. Thanks guys hope you can help me.

item.title: Stackable! :()
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

It should be a boolean like Stackable items: { 5553, 34452,232423,235254,5q345,3qt, } and stuff. xD

Read full topic

item.title: Stackable! :()
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Why would this be client sided?

Go into wherever your items are handled and search for either something “stack” or for the specific item IDs.

Read full topic
